How I build this website

this is a smbile project ,created with Pug-js, CSS3, and some JavaScript

i have used gulp-js toole for

  1. Compile and convert SCSS files into a CSS file and add prefixes to fit the old browsers and reduce their size
  2. Compile, convert Pug-js files into pretty HTML file
  3. Reduce JS file size
Open the WebSite
